description: '''Free-funk''' is a combination of [[avant-garde jazz]] with [[funk music]] that developed in the 1970s. Leaders of the genre include [[Ornette Coleman]] and his Prime Time group, [[Ronald Shannon Jackson]] and his group Decoding Society, [[Jamaaladeen Tacuma]] and his group Spectacle and [[James "Blood" Ulmer]]. The music has also been quite influential on the [[M-Base]] genre.
